item.title: Creating a Hugo blog
item.description: After spending a whole eight years of my career without a website, I decided enough is enough and started putting some research in to what kind of website I want to build. There are many options out there and I finally settled on something that will help me work quickly but also at a very low cost. It struck me fairly fast that I don’t want to spend a huge amount of time on things like site security, fees, maintenance.

item.title: About Philip Vieira
item.description: I am a self-taught software engineer. See my open source software at on my GitHub profile or follow me on my Twitter @zeeraw.
